Class StarMover

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--hipparcos.sky.StarMover
public class StarMover
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Take a SkyArea and periodically call move stars creating a backround animation it has its own thread and does not hang up the display
